articles.author: Press Trust of India | Posted by: Alfea Jamal
articles.title: Covid-19 lung damage caused by persistence of ‘abnormal cells’, say scientists - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Scientists have analysed organ samples from deceased Covid-19 patients and found extensive lung damage in most cases caused by the persistence of abnormal “fused cells,” an advance which sheds more light on the progression of the disease.
